reviews.review_msg: A very nice and kind professor. She tends to be little disorganized when it comes to schedule and assignments. Assignments were pretty easy. I found the lectures pretty boring, but I did learn a lot about Afro-futurism. I really liked the movie she picked, Black Panther for the assignment! One of the most memorable class I've taken this semester.

She is very nice and kind prof! She tends to be little disorganized when it comes to schedule and deadlines. Assignments were pretty easy. I really enjoyed watching Black Panther for the reading response. Lectures were bit boring, but the class was a breeze compared to other courses. Highly recommended. Blog assignment was fun to do.
